itemListElement.name: Toasted Coconut Balls – Toasted Coconut Ladoo

@graph.name: Toasted Coconut Balls - Toasted Coconut Ladoo Recipe
@graph.description: Toasted Coconut Balls - Toasted Coconut Cardamom Ladoo. 4 Ingredients! Ready in 20. Soft balls of coconut, coconut milk, cardamom and coconut sugar to celebrate Indian festivals. Use other flavors of choice. Makes 8 to 10 balls

video.name: Toasted Coconut Ladoo Balls - Indian Coconut Cardamom Dessert - VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Toasted Coconut Balls – Toasted Coconut Cardamom Ladoo. 4 Ingredients! Ready in 20.
Full Recipe and tips at --- http://www.veganricha.com/2016/10/toasted-coconut-balls-toasted-coconut-ladoo.html

Soft balls of coconut, coconut milk, cardamom and coconut sugar to celebrate the (Indian) festival season. Use other flavors of choice like vanilla, cinnamon or lemon zest to make Lemon Coconut Snowballs.

****************************************­*******
Connect with me!

* My Website: http://veganricha.com

* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/VeganRicha

* Instagram: http://instagram.com/veganricha

* Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/veganricha

* My cookbook: Vegan Richa's Indian kitchen http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1941252095/vegric-20

**************************************************************

recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups dried shredded coconut  (or fresh shredded coconut)
1 cup full fat coconut milk  (or coconut cream for fudgier)
seeds of 1 green cardamom pod ( or use other flavors as vanilla, cinnamon, lemon zest etc.)
1/3 cup or more raw sugar (coconut sugar or jaggery powder or date sugar)

recipeInstructions.text: If using dried shredded coconut, pulse the coconut shreds in a blender to make small shred or coarse meal size shreds and set aside. Pulse for a few seconds, 3 to 4 times. Crush cardamom seeds in a mortar and pestle and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: If using dried shredded coconut, pulse the coconut shreds in a blender to make small shred or coarse meal size shreds and set aside. Pulse for a few seconds, 3 to 4 times. Crush cardamom seeds in a mortar and pestle and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Dry toast the coconut in a skillet over medium low heat. Toast until most of the coconut is golden. 3 to 5 mins. Stir occasionally to avoid burning.
recipeInstructions.name: Dry toast the coconut in a skillet over medium low heat. Toast until most of the coconut is golden. 3 to 5 mins. Stir occasionally to avoid burning.

recipeInstructions.text: Add coconut milk/cream and cardamom, cook for 2 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add coconut milk/cream and cardamom, cook for 2 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sugar and salt, increase heat to medium and cook for 15 to 20 mins, or until the mixture completely absorbs the liquid and does not leak any moisture when squeezed or pressed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sugar and salt, increase heat to medium and cook for 15 to 20 mins, or until the mixture completely absorbs the liquid and does not leak any moisture when squeezed or pressed.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool to room temperature, them shape into balls. Serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Cool to room temperature, them shape into balls. Serve!

recipeInstructions.text: Keep covered on the counter for the day and refrigerated for upto a week.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep covered on the counter for the day and refrigerated for upto a week.
